bibl.title: List of Lessees and Summary of Seed Loans by Klerouchies.
Collectanea Papyrologica. Texts Published in Honor of H.C. Youtie. I
bibl.author: Pearl, Orsamus M.

bibl.note: P. Mich. Inv. 2952, 2954, 2960 a. Records of the same office, apparently the bureau of the village secretary. Karanis, 155/6 A.D. (?).
Pearl Orsamus M., List of Lessees and Summary of Seed Loans by Klerouchies.
Collectanea Papyrologica. Texts Published in Honor of H.C. Youtie. I (Bonn, 1976) pp. 361-370.
